name: Building & Co.: You Are the Architect!
name_original: Building & Co.: You Are the Architect!
description:
Building & Co.: You Are the Architect! is a strategy game developed by Creative Patterns and Palludio Games. It came out on 17-01-2008. It was published by Playlogic Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Building & Co.: You Are the Architect! is available on PC.
